items.title: Cantrips
items.content: Minor spells that cost no spell slots to cast. Can be used an unlimited number of times.

items.title: Spell Level
items.content: Determined by the power of the spell. More powerful spells/higher level spell slots are gained as you level up.

items.title: Spell Slots
items.content: A magical resource that dictates how many spells of that level you can cast. Refer to the class table for quantities.

items.title: Spell Attack & Save DC
items.content: 'Make an attack roll' spells require you to beat the enemies AC. Roll a D20 + Prof Bonus + Spellcasting Modifier (determined by class).
items.additional: Spells that require the enemy to make a saving throw have to beat your Spell Save DC = 8 + Prof Bonus + Spellcasting Modifier (determined by class).

items.title: Spell Synergy
items.content: Try combining spells with your allies for greater effect. For example, one caster could use Grease while another uses Fire Bolt to create a flaming hazard.
